signals.problem_statement: The current ticket management system is insufficient for the customer's needs.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for something more advanced than Lina AI.
signals.context: Team size not specified, focusing on ticket management and email management.

signals.problem_statement: The product does not support integration with WhatsApp for chatbot functionality.
signals.context: Team size not specified, focusing on WhatsApp usage for communication.

signals.problem_statement: The product lacks support for Arabic conversation in the chatbot.
signals.customer_ask: Support for Arabic conversation over WhatsApp.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement Arabic language support in the chatbot.
signals.context: Team size not specified, focusing on communication needs in Arabic.

signals.problem_statement: The product does not currently support forms and customer portal features.
signals.customer_ask: Inquiry about forms and customer portal support.
signals.suggested_solution: Add support for forms and customer portal.
signals.context: Team size not specified, looking for enhanced customer interaction features.
